function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of emerging technologies for COVID-19 management","Impact":"Potential over-reliance on technology, neglecting other effective strategies","Mitigation":"Ensure a balanced approach that integrates technological solutions with traditional public health measures","Technologies":"IoT, UAVs, AI, blockchain, 5G","People":"Global population","Owner":"Government health agencies, technology companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding of COVID-19 transmission mechanism and stages of spread","Impact":"Ineffective containment and control measures, leading to continued spread","Mitigation":"Invest in research and education to enhance understanding of transmission and spread stages","Technologies":"Research studies, epidemiological models","People":"Healthcare professionals, researchers","Owner":"Government health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Global economic impact of COVID-19","Impact":"Severe economic downturn, affecting livelihoods and businesses","Mitigation":"Implement economic stimulus measures, support businesses, and provide financial assistance to affected individuals","Technologies":"Economic modeling and analysis tools, financial management platforms","People":"Businesses, individuals, government agencies","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"}]}
